title: 8accarat
author: 8accarat
created_time: October 26, 2023, 04:51:46 PMLast edit: October 27, 2023, 02:35:11 PM by 8accarat
content: About baccarat.beehiiv.com    100% Free to play Social baccarat.    Daily rewards, tipping and giveaways.baccarat.beehiiv.com Bonuses    Bonuses are based on user activity baccarat.beehiiv.com Loyalty Program    Play, earn, refer and climb! Start collecting points from your first prediction.    Ascend through our loyalty tiers and unlock exclusive rewards..https://baccarat.beehiiv.com/p/baccarat

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: Check your site.It's only a subscribe, did you just want to collect (Email) for the data marketing to be used promotion about gambling ? Before that, we are welcome you in (Bitcointalk) now you can check on your site.I love playing live-games, I heard first time social-baccarat want to know (the meaning of that). It's just reguler baccarat ?

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: OP Is it a joke or something that I must enter my email before accessing your website? I was wondering about it because the thought that came to mind was that of email scouting websites that gather email for their own purpose. At least, there should be other options that one can access on your website for easy perusal, because with such features alone, nobody would be near your website to talk of inputting their email address for anything when they could not see anything worth it on the website. Here, first impression matters a lot, as members take cognizance of such, so you should see to it by working on such features on your website.It is nice having you here, mate.

comments.author: 8accarat
comments.body: Quote from: ryzaadit on October 26, 2023, 09:58:26 PMCheck your site.It's only a subscribe, did you just want to collect (Email) for the data marketing to be used promotion about gambling ? Before that, we are welcome you in (Bitcointalk) now you can check on your site.I love playing live-games, I heard first time social-baccarat want to know (the meaning of that). It's just reguler baccarat ?Hi ryzaadit,Currently it is just a daily email where I play one hand of baccarat everyday. The daily email comes with a poll attached where you can try to predict who will win the next hand (Player, Banker or tie). You can see a test email on https://baccarat.beehiiv.com/p/baccarat. My subscribers that predict the hand correctly get rewards and get a higher chance of winning giveaways in the future. We are also in the middle of creating social media groupchats for the community. I didn't expect this to take of so quickly so please bare with me

comments.author: 8accarat
comments.body: Quote from: CryptSafe on October 27, 2023, 09:55:09 AMOP Is it a joke or something that I must enter my email before accessing your website? I was wondering about it because the thought that came to mind was that of email scouting websites that gather email for their own purpose. At least, there should be other options that one can access on your website for easy perusal, because with such features alone, nobody would be near your website to talk of inputting their email address for anything when they could not see anything worth it on the website. Here, first impression matters a lot, as members take cognizance of such, so you should see to it by working on such features on your website.It is nice having you here, mate.Hi cryptsafe,as I explained to ryzaadit;Quote from: 8accarat on October 27, 2023, 01:48:11 PMHi ryzaadit,Currently it is just a daily email where I play one hand of baccarat everyday. The daily email comes with a poll attached where you can try to predict who will win the next hand (Player, Banker or tie). You can see a test email on https://baccarat.beehiiv.com/p/baccarat. My subscribers that predict the hand correctly get rewards and get a higher chance of winning giveaways in the future. We are also in the middle of creating social media groupchats for the community. I didn't expect this to take of so quickly so please bare with me                      The email is the product. My goal is to create a community that, like myself, really enjoy gambling. The email is currently only to get input. Yes, I intend to monetize by advertising in the future for selfish reasons (got to pay rent someway hehehe)  but mainly because I think this will greatly benefit the community.

comments.author: Agbe
comments.body: Quote from: ryzaadit on October 26, 2023, 09:58:26 PMCheck your site.It's only a subscribe, did you just want to collect (Email) for the data marketing to be used promotion about gambling ? Before that, we are welcome you in (Bitcointalk) now you can check on your site.I love playing live-games, I heard first time social-baccarat want to know (the meaning of that). It's just reguler baccarat ? That is what I wanted to comment on. It is only subscribe that is there and some Chinese writing supported by small English explanation of "Today" or "Tomorrow". Op at least even the casino is from non English speaking countries let it be that English language should be used in the general boards in the gambling section so everyone can participate and if you want it to be locally participation then you you should write it clearly that it is only for the country gamblers so with that non native speaker can avoid such thread. Or preferably, drop it in the local board. And your site still need a lot to work on. Now if I subscribed what will I do or received? Or the main link will be send to the subscribed email for me to continue? Baccarat is a nice game which even household use to play to pass time and most for fun. So make things easier for user to participate here.

comments.author: CryptSafe

Here, first impression matters a lot, as members take cognizance of such, so you should see to it by working on such features on your website.It is nice having you here, mate.Hi cryptsafe,as I explained to ryzaadit;Quote from: 8accarat on October 27, 2023, 01:48:11 PMHi ryzaadit,Currently it is just a daily email where I play one hand of baccarat everyday. The daily email comes with a poll attached where you can try to predict who will win the next hand (Player, Banker or tie). You can see a test email on https://baccarat.beehiiv.com/p/baccarat. My subscribers that predict the hand correctly get rewards and get a higher chance of winning giveaways in the future. We are also in the middle of creating social media groupchats for the community. I didn't expect this to take of so quickly so please bare with me                      The email is the product. My goal is to create a community that, like myself, really enjoy gambling. The email is currently only to get input. Yes, I intend to monetize by advertising in the future for selfish reasons (got to pay rent someway hehehe)  but mainly because I think this will greatly benefit the community.Do you think members here are easily moved by those gimmicks. How can you tell me that you are compiling people's email addresses for your own selfish interest to monetise them in the future. Of which benefits do you think it would be to the masses here.  I would like you to mention the benefits attached to the collection of emails from members rather than sending phishing links to email addresses. Can you clarify things so we could get it clear.

comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: Quote from: 8accarat on October 27, 2023, 02:05:58 PMThe email is the product. My goal is to create a community that, like myself, really enjoy gambling. The email is currently only to get input. Yes, I intend to monetize by advertising in the future for selfish reasons (got to pay rent someway hehehe)  but mainly because I think this will greatly benefit the community.There are loads of ways to get email if email is the product. Over here in the forum, we care about working products rather than people farming emails and hoping to make the most out of email marketing.There are services offering database filled with emails where they can give, for a considerate price, emails of people within a particular niche so as to achieve your set goals.

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Quote from: 8accarat on October 26, 2023, 04:51:46 PMAbout baccarat.beehiiv.comI am very against gambling sites that log in to customer site accounts that indicate email, I have experience with several types of baccarat sites that require email, maybe for me there is no problem using a disposable email after it is thrown away.What irritates me from the baccarat experience that I have registered is:* First: if the baccarat party doesn't want us anymore or the site has problems they can easily block the email connected to the user's account, with a million ways the user still can't log in again.* Second: the site can block emails/accounts at any time if there is no preferred method given to log in, they will be notified that the user's login will fail all the time.I'm not saying that the baccarat.beehiiv.com site does that, but from experience that has happened, that's an actual fact, so anyone should still be careful on behalf of a gambling site that is a customer.

Of which benefits do you think it would be to the masses here.  I would like you to mention the benefits attached to the collection of emails from members rather than sending phishing links to email addresses. Unfortunately, this community does not condone this kind of marketing trick, I mean he wanted to collect emails here and then uses it later for his promotion or for whatever purposes it might serve him in the future.And with that, I don't think he can gain traction here from the community. There are a lot of baccarat players here, but they would rather play on platform, that is reputable instead of this kind of set up and make money.Not saying that the OP is not trusted, but we can smell from a far what he wanted to accomplished here and it doesn't sound good to the gamblers here.
